data.name: Pickleball One
data.description:
Dive into America's fastest-growing sport while making new friends! Master Pickleball anytime, anywhere, whether as a single player or with up to 4 participants. Beyond just singles and doubles, this app includes in-depth fitness and training modules, that will elevate both your physical and virtual gameplay. Experience a mixed-reality setting for immersive wall drills, practice sessions, and workouts.

Introductory price: $24.99

ENJOY REAL-FEEL GAMEPLAY - Physics, sound, and haptics have been carefully mapped to mirror the real game. Scoring and rules are based on the USA Pickleball Associationâ€™s Official Rulebook and support for several grip attachments makes every swing feel authentic.

CONNECT & COMPETE WITH FRIENDS - Seamlessly set up and enjoy singles or doubles matches, or even invite friends to watch. Pickleball thrives on social interaction, and in VR, it's no different.

ACE YOUR TRAINING AND FITNESS GOALS - Hone skills like serves, dinks, and volleys. Enhance stamina and leg strength with rhythm-based exercises. Celebrate your effort with achievements and monitor progress via a workout calendar.

MOVE FREELY IN MIXED REALITY - Get ready to play with a clear view of your surroundings using the full-color Passthrough feature found in Meta Quest 3 and Meta Quest Pro. Whether engaging in wall practice or fitness workouts, you can now really move without fear of running into something.

Pickleball One is the ultimate social sports and fitness platform.
